_header: All that will of solace lere
_description: The ‘Romance of Sir Corneus’ or ‘The Cukwold’s Daunce’ — 255 lines, generally in 6-line stanzas

BodAsh61.First Lines:
All þat wyll of solas lereHerkyns now & ȝe schall
                    hereAnd ȝe kane vnderstondOff a bowrd I wyll ȝou
                    schew…
BodAsh61.Last Lines:
…God gyff vs grace þat we may goTo heuyn amen
                    amen
